# Portfolio Website - Sharmila Devarajan

This is a modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js for Sharmila Devarajan, showcasing her expertise in AI/ML, full-stack development, and agentic automation platforms.

## Project Guidelines
- Use Next.js with TypeScript for the frontend framework
- Implement responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Create sections for: About, Experience, Skills, Projects, Contact
- Focus on clean, professional design that attracts recruiters
- Highlight AI/ML and automation expertise prominently
- Use modern web development best practices

## Development Rules
- Use '.' as the working directory
- Follow TypeScript best practices
- Implement responsive design patterns
- Optimize for performance and SEO
- Use semantic HTML and accessibility standards
